A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the new direction of these Star Wars movies are going. I would say this movie moves into my top 3 of Star Wars movies. I've seen it twice amd it was better the second time because you take so much information the first time. People who seem to hate/critic this movie are the people who cant let go of the old and refuse to move forward. Rian Johnson is going to take us towards a new chapter of Star Wars. JJ Abrams has part IX. Lets see what he will bring back.
